CustomBehavior.Text: Use the item on Reth while flying, then drift around on your mount until he is dead (don't engage him in combat or you won't get credit)

End of Dailies - press continue to farm for eggs - make sure the Netherwing and OpenThatStuff Plugins are enabled!\n\nIf you want to do a few more quests that the bot can't do atm, go up top and do them
